required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Acute Whole Body Vibration Change the Glycemic and Lactate Levels
clinical_study.official_title: Acute Whole Body Vibration Decrease the Glucose Levels in Elderly Diabetic Women

brief_summary.textblock: The type II diabetes is characterized by high levels of blood glucose followed by excessive insulin release so that the target cells become less sensitive and develop insulin resistance, maintaining hyperglycemic levels. The Whole body vibration session may improve the glucose metabolism in diabetic patients by reducing the peripheral blood sugar. Ten healthy elderly women and eight diabetic elderly women were allocated into two groups, and have made an acute whole body session.

study_design_info.masking_description: A researcher was performed the interventional protocol and a different researcher was made the evaluations

primary_outcome.time_frame: before and immediately after the 10 minute intervention
primary_outcome.description: A digital puncture with disposable lancets was collected a peripheral blood drop in the specific strip for the home glucose monitoring AccuChek Active® (Roche Diagnostics GmbH, Mannheim, Germany) according to International Organization for Standardization (ISO) recommendations in 2013 (11).

primary_outcome.time_frame: before and immediately after the 10 minute intervention
primary_outcome.description: Another peripheral blood drop was collected from the same digital puncture with disposable lancets and put in the specific strip for to check the seric blood lactate, which was analyzed by a portable lactimeter Accutrend Plus ® (Roche Accutrend Plus, New York, USA).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and immediately after the 10 minute intervention
secondary_outcome.description: measured with a digital oximeter Onyx (Nonim, model 9500, USA)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and immediately after the 10 minute intervention
secondary_outcome.description: measured with a digital oximeter Onyx (Nonim, model 9500, USA)

secondary_outcome.measure: Borg's Rating of Perceived Exertion Scale (RPE) or Modified Borg Scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and immediately after the 10 minute intervention
secondary_outcome.description: visual scale that measure the perceived exertion in muscle or dyspnoea, measuring values between 0 at 10

arm_group.description: healthy elderly were use the Whole body vibration intervention during 10 minutes
diabetic elderly were use the Whole body vibration intervention during 10 minutes

intervention.description: whole body vibration training on a vibrating platform with healthy elderly and diabetic elderly
